categories: Category:Cut content from Battle of the Sith Lords
Category:Sith Lords of Darth Krayt's Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Darth Inexor was a humanoid Sith Lord with red eyes and gray skin who served the New Empire under Darth Krayt's rule.

Darth Inexor was a proposed character for the video game Battle of the Sith Lords, which was being developed by Red Fly Studio around 2011. Concept art for the character was published by Game Informer in a special May 2014 issue.
